Tips for prospective students
In three sentences
Comments
I feel so safe at Le Moyne! Every dorm building needs a swipe to get in, there are a lot of cameras and the security team is always doing rounds!
Although we don't have any greek life houses, there are lots of honor societies to join.
There are so many clubs and activities!
Nice, caring, driven, motivated, eager.
Dolphy Day is certainly a surprise and experience!
I feel my money is being put to good use at Le Moyne.
Going on service trips, attending sporting events, going to floor programs, there is always something going on at Le Moyne!
We just got an entire new dining center, the food is great and it's beautiful! There is also the Dolphin Den and coffee shop.
I love the dorms, they are very clean and comfortable! Being on campus is so much fun!
All professors are very helpful and take the time to get to know you as a person, and they are very understanding and set office hours that are convenient for everyone!
I would suggest to get involved! Join clubs, attend floor programs (if available) and enjoy the time you have getting to know yourself!
Le Moyne College is the perfect place to combine learning and individual growth. Le Moyne helps students inside and out of the classroom. Le Moyne offers many experiences that other colleges can not.

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Tanya from North Syracuse, NY 03/29/2011 Reviewer is Accepted here and planning to attend soon. Reviewer has been to campus. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 3 of 27 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Le Moyne is great for all types of students, just always have your hear a 100% into a higher level of education. Tips for prospective students Take advantage of the resources available, they have tutors, great library,and excellent teachers. Don't waste all the good right in front of you. Bang for the buck A good education always comes with a big price, but with this college the offer as much finacial aid they can possibly give. Scholarships are available and they have a finacial aid office that will help will everything a student needs. Will enjoy being here Parents, teachers, family
